tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SpaceMissions (
    mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    launch_date DATE,
    destination TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE missions (
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(255),
  launch_date DATE,
  destination VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE discoveries (
  discovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  discovery_name VARCHAR(255),
  discovery_date DATE,
  discoverer VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE scientists (
  scientist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scientist_name VARCHAR(255),
  expertise VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_name VARCHAR(255),
  research_date DATE,
  researcher_id INT,
  discovery_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES scientists(scientist_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (discovery_id) REFERENCES discoveries(discovery_id)
)
CREATE TABLE Mission ( mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_name VARCHAR(255), launch_date DATE, destination VARCHAR(255), purpose VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE Astronaut ( astronaut_id INT PRIMARY KEY, astronaut_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, nationality VARCHAR(255), mission_id INT );
CREATE TABLE Discovery ( discovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY, discovery_name VARCHAR(255), discovery_date DATE, discovery_location VARCHAR(255), mission_id INT );
CREATE TABLE Spacecraft ( spacecraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY, spacecraft_name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(255), launch_date DATE, mission_id INT );
CREATE TABLE Scientist ( scientist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, scientist_name VARCHAR(255), field_of_study VARCHAR(255), nationality VARCHAR(255), discovery_id INT );
